name: Genex Ally Triforce
effectText:
1 "Genex" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
This card's effects depend on the Attribute(s) of its non-Tuner Synchro Material Monsters.
●EARTH: If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.
●FIRE: If this card destroys a monster by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.
●LIGHT: Once per turn, you can select 1 LIGHT monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position.
